examples: there's a fellow at the door

definitions.text: a friend who is frequently in the company of another
a person who is member of one's class or profession
examples: he sent e-mail to his fellow hackers
he lost the mate to his shoe
one eye was blue but its fellow was brown

definitions.text: a member of a learned society
examples: he was elected a fellow of the American Physiological Association

definitions.text: an informal form of address for a man
examples: Say, fellow, what are you doing?

definitions.text: a man who is the lover of a girl or young woman
examples: if I'd known he was her boyfriend I wouldn't have asked
